description: This file defines data models related to reasoning steps and actions, including enums and Pydantic models for structured reasoning process representation.

classes.name: NextAction
classes.description: Enumeration of possible next actions in reasoning process, such as continue, validate, final answer, or reset.

classes.name: ReasoningStep
classes.description: Data model representing a single reasoning step, including title, action, result, reasoning, next action, and confidence.

classes.name: ReasoningSteps
classes.description: Data model encapsulating a list of reasoning steps.

methods.name: ReasoningStep
methods.description: Constructor for creating a reasoning step with optional fields for title, action, result, reasoning, next_action, and confidence.

methods.name: ReasoningSteps
methods.description: Constructor for creating a collection of reasoning steps.
